amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce various accounts by a total of $3,250,437,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce various accounts by $3,250,437,000 and transfer the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 96 - 313 (Roll no. 538).
